div.div:
Bond 2020 BHISD will have a Bond Election beginning with early voting from April 20-28 and concluding on election day, May 2. All precincts will vote at the C.T. Joseph Conference Center. All registered voters are eligible to vote by mail.
Learn More

Distance Learning Visit our Distance Learning during COVID-19 webpage for frequently asked questions and resources for parents, students and staff.
Learn More

div.p: Sign up to receive text and email alerts from the Mont Belvieu INFOrce notification system. Individuals will receive quick information via text and then more detailed information via email.

Technical assistance is available for parents, students and staff having difficulty with devices or software. Please fill out the form below and a technical support representative will respond to you as soon as possible.

Governor Abbott has announced that all school activities will remain closed for the duration of the year. Activities such as Graduation are still being discussed and Barbers Hill will be as creative and determined as possible to ensure our students are given the recognition they richly deserve.

El gobernador Abbott anunció hoy que todas las actividades escolares permanecerán cerradas durante todo este año escolar. Todavía se están discutiendo actividades como la graduación, y BH será tan creativo y determinado como sea posible para garantizar que nuestros estudiantes reciban el reconocimiento que se merecen.

BH will be following the Governor's directive today that all Texas schools will be closed for traditional learning until May 4. BH will continue utilizing online learning and performing essential operations during the interim. BH is ...
Going the Distance for Excellence!

BH seguirá la directiva que el Gobernador dio hoy de que todas las escuelas de Texas estarán cerradas por aprendizaje tradicional hasta el 4 de mayo. BH continuará utilizando el aprendizaje en línea y realizando operaciones esenciales durante el período intermedio. BH es .....
¡Recorriendo la distancia por excelencia!

A reminder that BH is closed to traditional learning per Governor Abbott's order at least through next week. We will be making announcements regarding future closures at 2:00 PM on Friday, April 3. BH is ... Going the Distance For Excellence!

BHISD will continue to provide educational services via an online platform for the foreseeable future. We will be following Governor Abbott’s recommendation that all schools close through April 3rd. We will make a decision regarding the future on that Friday at 2 p.m. The situation is fast changing and it is probable that we will continue to provide distance learning beyond the date of April 3rd, and we will continue to be in contact with key state officials regarding the safest options for our children.

Barbers Hill is committed to achieving the most productive and positive online educational experience in the state, and we have provided 1200 chrome books towards this goal. We had close to 100% participation in our technology survey, and we greatly appreciate our parents and our community!
BHISD truly is… Excellent By Any Measure!

BHISD continuará brindando servicios educativos a través de una plataforma en línea en el futuro previsible. Seguiremos la recomendación del gobernador Abbott de que todas las escuelas cierren hasta el 3 de abril. Tomaremos una decisión sobre el futuro ese viernes a las 2 p.m. La situación está cambiando rápidamente y es probable que continuemos brindando educación a distancia más allá de la fecha del 3 de abril, y continuamos en contacto con funcionarios estatales con respecto a las opciones más seguras para nuestros niños.

Barbers Hill se compromete a lograr la experiencia educativa en línea más productiva y positiva del estado, y hemos proporcionado 1200 ordenadores Chrome Books para este objetivo. Tuvimos una participación cercana al 100% en nuestra encuesta tecnológica, ¡y apreciamos mucho a nuestros padres y nuestra comunidad!
BHISD realmente es ... ¡Excelente en cualquier medida!
Eagle Families,
If you are in need of a device for your child, the final date/time to pick up will be Thursday, March 19th at Barbers Hill High School (Main Entrance) from (11a.m.-1p.m) and (4:00p.m-6:00p.m).
Please continue to visit the BHISD website for any updates. We have created a page dedicated to (Distance Learning through COVID-19). https://www.bhisd.net/fs/pages/1762
We want to thank you all again for your support !
March 17, 2020
BHISD Families,

We want to thank you for your patience and understanding as we gather information from our families regarding technology devices and WIFI services at home. Your prompt responses are appreciated and the direct result of our ability to begin the deployment of devices to families starting Wednesday, March 18th. In order to accommodate the needs of ALL students, we are able to provide 1 device per 2 students per household for those that indicated “NO DEVICE” on their survey.

BHISD has created a webpage dedicated to Distance Learning during COVID-19 https://www.bhisd.net/parents-students/distance-learning-during-covid-19. We will continue to communicate using Skylert, but the dedicated webpage will have any updates or messages sent out by the district as well.

Soon you will receive instructions from your campus principal on how best to support your children through distance learning at home. Please continue to monitor your email, the district website, and social media channels for any updates.
div.h2: When & Where do I pick up devices?

p.b: Wednesday, March 18th at Barbers Hill High School (Front 3 rotundas)

div.p: Pick- up Schedule: In following the President’s protocol of no more than 10 people gathered, we are permitting one representative per family for device check out.
div.h2: Where can I access WiFi, if I don’t have it at home?

ul.li: BH Parking Lots- Look for WiFi Zone signs
Eagle Pointe Circle Drive/Some Parking Lot- (MBLink Public WiFi)

br.b: How can I get internet access at home?

ul.li: MB Link (offering priority to new MB Link installs if they have a BHISD student living in the home) www.mblinktx.net or call 844-4MB-LINK
Suddenlink- 60 days free - call 888-633-0030 to enroll in Suddenlink region
NexGen Wireless Internet Service Provider- 281-723-2792 (Free Basic Internet)

div.p: NexGen WIMS have set up multiple WiFi access points. A few of the locations/subdivisions where students may utilize WiFi for school work only is:

ul.li: Old River Baptist Church parking lot

div.p:
The free WiFi network is: BH Student Access
The password is: wecanwewill
div.h2: How do I receive Skylert messages?
div.p: Please follow the steps on the click coach. You can also join our text alerts.
Familias de BHISD,

Queremos agradecerle su paciencia y comprensión mientras recopilamos información de nuestras familias sobre dispositivos tecnológicos y servicios WIFI en el hogar. Sus rápidas respuestas son apreciadas y el resultado directo de nuestra capacidad para iniciar el despliegue de los dispositivos a las familias a partir del miércoles, 18 de marzo. Con el fin de satisfacer las necesidades de TODOS los estudiantes, podemos proporcionar 1 dispositivo por 2 estudiantes por hogar para aquellos que indicaron "NO DISPOSITIVO" en su encuesta.

BHISD ha creado una página web dedicada al aprendizaje a distancia durante COVID-19 https://www.bhisd.net/parents-students/distance-learning-during-covid-19. Continuaremos comunicándonos usando Skylert, pero la página web dedicada también tendrá actualizaciones o mensajes enviados por el distrito.

Los directores de las escuelas conocerán la mejor manera de apoyar a sus hijos a través del aprendizaje a distancia en el hogar. Continúe monitoreando su correo electrónico, el sitio web del distrito y los canales de redes sociales para cualquier actualización

p.b: miércoles 18 de marzo en Barbers Hill High School (3 rotundas en frente del edificio)

div.p: Horario de recogida: Al seguir el protocolo del Presidente de no más de 10 personas reunidas, estamos permitiendo un representante por familia para la distribución del dispositivo.

ul.li: Estacionamientos BH- Busque señales de Zona WIFI
Eagle Pointe - camino de entrada circular/ciertas áreas de la playa de estacionamiento- (MBLink Public WIFI)

div.h2: Acceso a internet para el hogar

ul.li: Suddenlink- 60 días gratis 888-633-0030 para inscribirse en la región de Suddenlink
proveedor de servicios de Internet inalámbrico NexGen- 281-723-2792 (Internet básico gratuito)

div.p: Siga los pasos en el entrenador de click coach. También puede unirse a nuestras alertas de texto.

Barbers Hill ISD will not be operating in the traditional school setting for the foreseeable future. We will make the call each week on Friday at 2 p.m. regarding the next week’s activities. There are no confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Chambers County, but our decision to close schools is out of an abundance of caution in placing our students, staff, and the community’s health as our top priority.

BHISD is in ongoing contact with key officials and will continue to monitor this ever changing health crisis. We have been preparing distance learning platforms in preparation for just such an event and will initiate online classrooms depending upon the duration of the crisis. Information regarding the implementation of distance learning will be communicated at a later date.

Our district is fortunate to be in sound financial condition and there will be no payroll interruptions for any staff regardless of the duration of this event. More information will be forthcoming to staff regarding responsibilities and assignments.
Again, BHISD is closing normal school operations for the foreseeable future and will be making a decision at 2 p.m. each Friday regarding the future weeks’ activities.
Barbers Hill ISD CAN and WILL persevere through this health crisis.

Barbers Hill ISD no funcionará en el entorno escolar tradicional en el futuro previsible. Haremos la llamada cada semana los viernes a las 2 p.m. con respecto a las actividades de la próxima semana. No hay casos confirmados de COVID-19 en el Condado de Chambers, pero nuestra decisión de cerrar las escuelas es por precaución a nuestros estudiantes, personal y la salud de la comunidad como nuestra principal prioridad.

BHISD está en contacto continuo con funcionarios claves y continuará monitoreando esta crisis de salud en constante cambio. Hemos estado preparando plataformas de aprendizaje a distancia en preparación para tal evento e iniciaremos aulas en línea dependiendo de la duración de la crisis. La información sobre la implementación del aprendizaje a distancia se comunicará en una fecha posterior.

Nuestro distrito tiene la suerte de estar en buenas condiciones financieras y no habrá interrupciones de nómina para ningún personal, a pesar de la duración de este evento. Se enviará más información al personal sobre las responsabilidades y tareas durante este evento.
Nuevamente, BHISD está cerrando las operaciones normales de la escuela en el futuro previsible y tomará una decisión a las 2 p.m. cada viernes con respecto a las actividades de la semana futura.
Barbers Hill ISD PUEDE y SERÁ perseverante a través de esta crisis de salud.

We are continuing to closely monitor information concerning the coronavirus (COVID-19) and are following the guidance and expertise of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), Chambers County Health Department and Texas Department of State Health Services.
Please read the Coronavirus Update for more information.
In an effort to minimize the loss of instructional time and loss of credit, Barbers Hill ISD will begin online distance learning on Monday, March 23.
If you have questions, please check the Online Learning FAQs below.
If your question/answer is not listed in the FAQs, please submit your question in the form below.
Letters to parents from campuses can be found in the sections below.
Campus Resources for students and parents provided by campuses can be found in the sections below. Please allow time resources to be added.
Resources for staff, students and parents are included in the HUB links in the sections below.

We are hoping we will be able to have student workers this summer in technology and grounds. If you are interested, you must be 16 years of age. Summer dates will be June 1 - August 7. Deadline to fill out an application is May 4.
